title: When is Ask Huda aired where they do Q&A? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: ABD Rahman from India do we know when the ask is happening sometimes we can't ask this ask questions in this program I have searched the timings but I couldn't find them do we know any other program like this so that we can ask I have no idea I don't have a TV in my home so I know that ask Huda Sheikh Muhammad Salah Dr Muhammad Salah has it uh I think twice weekly maybe three times weekly I don't know about the days or the times you can log in to their website and find inshallah the timings and how to connect with them
